**[POPCAT]** +43bps - POPCAT experienced significant volatility today due to a deliberate market manipulation on Hyperliquid. An individual withdrew $3M USDC from OKX, distributed it across 19 wallets, and opened $20-$30M long positions on POPCAT, creating a fake buy wall at $0.21. This incident, linked to previous manipulations, caused Hyperliquid to temporarily pause its Arbitrum bridge, sparking widespread discussion about market manipulation and the risks of high leverage on decentralized exchanges.
